name: Ctrl+S Xmas
description:
Santa is sad...

He let everyone know that Christmas is canceled...

What is there to do? You need to save Christmas and make the children happy!

Travel, talk to the creatures you meet, collect candy and gifts and save the festivities!

Instructions:

Click on the dialog buttons to choose an answer

Move with the arrow keys

Jump with the Space bar

When appropriate, don't touch the ground

When appropriate, match your key presses with the letters on the screen

Credits coming soon...
